MSG_1.message: Tagh “{yes}” gus falbh ’s tilleadh dha na prògraman dòrainneach agad.

MSG_10.message: Nach tagh thu “{no}” gus barrachd àm a chaitheamh gun chiall?

MSG_11.message: Cha ghèill taisgealaiche ach lean air adhart is briog air “{yes}” mur e taisgealaiche a th’ annad.

MSG_12.message: Tagh “{no}” ma tha thu tapaidh ’s an tòir air tasgal. Mur eil, briog air “{yes}” gu cùramach.

MSG_13.description: "Seeing" as in having an affair / being unfaithful
MSG_13.message: Cha bhruidhinn sinn tuilleadh. An ann gu bheil leannan eile agad?

MSG_14.message: A bheil rud as cudromaiche agad ri dhèanamh dha-rìribh?

MSG_15.message: A bheil thu a’ gèilleadh mar-thà?

MSG_16.description: A little homage to the movie 2001 A Space Odyssey
MSG_16.message: A bheil thu cinnteach, a laochain?

MSG_17.description: WIMP could mean Weakly Interacting Massive Particle, good luck translating that! Just go with the other meaning of the word, or make something else up, e.g."Magellan didn't quit".

MSG_18.message: Nach tusa an laoch! Cha ghèill ach gealtairean, a bheil thu cinnteach gu bheil thu airson fàgail?

MSG_19.description: Alluding to / inviting the player to contribute content to the game
MSG_19.message: Deiseil ieis an deuchainn, a bheil thu airson tilleadh dhan mhodh tabhartais?

MSG_2.message: Na falbh an-dràsta, tha spùinneadair a’ feitheamh ort sa phrògram eile.

MSG_21.message: Cridhe na circe annad, an e?

MSG_22.message: Na fàg! Thèid cùisean am feabhas le cinnt! A bheil thu airson gèilleadh co-dhiù?

MSG_3.message: A bheil thu cinnteach gu bheil thu airson an sàr-gheama seo fhàgail a fhuair thu an-asgaidh?

MSG_5.message: Tagh “{no}” airson gunnaichean ’s glòir, “{yes}” airson obair ’s dragh.

MSG_6.message: Briog air “{no}” ma tha thu dàna no air “{yes}” ’s nàire ort.

MSG_7.description: Doom 1 anyone? Although it said DOS instead of Command line
MSG_7.message: Chan fhàgainn-sa. Tha an loidhne-àithne mòran nas dona.

MSG_8.message: Saoilidh mi gu bheil thu airson briogadh air “{no}” gus barrachd a chluich. Siuthad ma-thà.

MSG_9.message: Is ciall dha “{yes}” gum feum thu tilleadh dhan obair làithreach agad.

QUIT.message: A bheil thu airson fàgail an-seo?
